org.ggp.base.util.game

Class LocalGameRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ggp.base.util.game.GameRepository
      • org.ggp.base.util.game.LocalGameRepository

  • public final class LocalGameRepository
extends GameRepository
    Local game repositories provide access to game resources stored on the local disk, bundled with the GGP Base project. For consistency with the web-based GGP.org infrastructure, this starts a simple HTTP server that provides access to the local game resources, and then uses the standard RemoteGameRepository interface to read from that server.
    Author:
    Sam
